reviewText: My son can't get enough of the Signing time collection. This is no different. He's yet to get motivated to make any animal sounds, but persistence is key, I suppose.
Title: Signing Time! Volume 9: The Zoo Train

reviewText: Play,sing and sign along with Signing Time while learning American Sign Lauguage. It's natural and fun for them to use their bodies to communicate. Research shows that children love signing.
summary: The smartest playtime activity, Hands down!
Title: Signing Time! Volume 9: The Zoo Train

reviewText: For our animal loving child, this is a huge hit. Needless to say we were quite thrilled when this one came out, so we could finally learn the signs to some of our favorite animals. Our 5 year old loves to sign and sing to all the songs on the video, especially Guess What I Am. We try to make a game out of it and it can go on and on and on...  My 5 year old and I highly recommend Signing Time.
summary: So many animals, so many signs
Title: Signing Time! Volume 9: The Zoo Train

reviewText: After just watching this DVD once my daughter learned more animals names and signs then from the books we have read since she was born. She loves signing time and loves watching this DVD. This is a must have!
Title: Signing Time! Volume 9: The Zoo Train

reviewText: We go to the zoo a ton, so I thought this would be a fun one to add to our Signing Time library.  I don't like the songs as well as some of the others we have, but my girls love it and seeing my 18 month old sign penguin while watching the penguins - priceless.  We often put it on in the car on the way to the zoo.
summary: Enjoy this DVD - not my fave, but my kids love it!
Title: Signing Time! Volume 9: The Zoo Train

reviewText: My adult son is an ASL interpreter and I wanted a program that taught children ASL.  It is great!  The two main children are Leah, who is Deaf and Alex, who is hearing.  They are cousins and do a great job.  Emilee does a fabulous job of teaching children ASL, in a fun and musical way.  I researched lots of programs searching for a fun ASL program.  This is it!
Title: Signing Time! Volume 9: The Zoo Train
